resources.string:
Ogmo wakes up in a black room.
Unsure of the dangers that await him.
Ogmo sees a portal.
Ogmo hops in.

That black room again.
The Jungle was a dangerous place.
Hopefully this next place is safer...
Hopefully.

Slightly singed,
Ogmo escapes the flaming Desert.
Why Ogmo goes on, no one knows.
Ogmo just must.

Like always, Ogmo had no idea
what was ahead of him,
but went on regardless.

To be continued?

'Ogmo' and 'Jumper' are property of/
Matt Thorson mattmakesgames.com

Programming, levels, art, and sound/
Adam Metcalf djgamblore.com
